trans-unit.source: Factory that provides instances of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> in managed hosting environments where the host instance is created dynamically in response to incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 在 Managed 裝載環境中提供 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 執行個體的處理站，在這個環境中會動態建立主機執行個體以回應傳入訊息。

trans-unit.source: The managed hosting environments that support dynamic activation are Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Process Activation Service (WAS).
trans-unit.target: 支援動態啟動的 Managed 裝載環境包括網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 和 Windows Process Activation Service (WAS)。

trans-unit.source: If you have implemented a custom derivative of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>, consider also implementing a factory that derives from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已實作了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 的自訂衍生，建議您一併實作衍生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory> 類別的處理站。

trans-unit.source: If you have implemented a custom derivative of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> instead, then consider also implementing a factory that derives your factory from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactoryBase> directly.
trans-unit.target: 反之，如果您已實作了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> 的自訂衍生，建議您一併實作直接從 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactoryBase> 衍生您處理站的處理站。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the workflow markup file that defines the workflow service or the type name of the workflow service type.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程標記檔案的檔案名稱，此檔案定義了工作流程服務，或工作流程服務型別的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的陣列，其中包含所裝載之服務的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> from a string that contains either the file name of the workflow markup file or the type name of the workflow service type and the base address of the service specified.
trans-unit.target: 從含有工作流程標記檔案之檔案名稱的字串，或含有工作流程服務型別名稱與指定的服務基底位址之字串，來建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> object associated with the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 與工作流程服務關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> object with the specified base addresses.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回含有指定基底位址的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The `constructorString` argument could be either a fully qualified workflow type name or it could be the relative file path of the workflow definition file declared in the .svc file in which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory> directives are placed.
trans-unit.target: `constructorString` 引數可以是完整的工作流程型別名稱，或者也可以是 .svc 檔案中宣告的工作流程定義檔之相對檔案路徑 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory> 指示詞放在這個 .svc 檔中)。

trans-unit.source: To associate a rule definition with a workflow definition, name the rule definition file the same name as the workflow definition file with a .rules extension and place it in same directory as the workflow definition file.
trans-unit.target: 若要將規則定義與工作流程定義關聯在一起，請將規則定義檔命名為工作流程定義檔相同的檔名，加上 .rules 副檔名，並將此檔案置於工作流程定義檔的相同目錄中。

trans-unit.source: For example, the rules definition file CalculatorServiceWorkflow.rules must be in the same directory as CalculatorServiceWorkflow.xoml.
trans-unit.target: 例如，規則定義檔 CalculatorServiceWorkflow.rules 必須跟 CalculatorServiceWorkflow.xoml 放在同一個目錄。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of a type-based reference to the workflow service CalculatorServiceWorkflow.
trans-unit.target: 以下是工作流程服務 CalculatorServiceWorkflow 的型別式參照範例。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of a workflow definition file reference to the workflow service CalculatorServiceWorkflow.
trans-unit.target: 以下是工作流程服務 CalculatorServiceWorkflow 的工作流程定義檔參照範例。
